articles.title: Why SSR ?
articles.description: SSR make your JS app optimized for SEO
articles.description_longue: You would create website only with vue, fully referenced in Google? You need tuse server side rendering (ssr). Why SSR work ? your js script was pre-compiled by the server and inject directly in the html. SSR is fast, your app is directly charged on the demande. How to add SSR in my app ? you need to entry point : [the server side](/article/Server%20entry) and [the client side](/blog/client-entry)

articles.title: Server entry
articles.description_longue: It's the file who use by server to generate and prerender your app. Server-entry generate full html app and render metadatas use by search engine.

articles.title: Client entry
articles.description_longue: After SSR, it client-side to the the controll of the app, make the app server-less.

articles.title: Create your webpack configuration
articles.description: You need to compile your code differently way for server-side and the client side
articles.description_longue: You need to compile your code differently way for server-side and the client side. You need to create (see previously) server entry and client entry.

articles.title: Thinks server-side !
articles.description: You need to adapte your component for the server side rendering
articles.description_longue: You need to adapte your component for the server side rendering. In server side you don't have window dom!
